questions.question: I am traveling with my family, they stole all our bags from our rented car, will the insurance reimburse the value of what stolen?
questions.outcome_justification: SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE CHAPTER 1 – FLIGHT DELAY Article 1.1: 'In the event of a delay of the insured flight [...] the Company shall indemnify the Insured.' No policy sections reference coverage for theft of personal belongings or luggage.

questions.question: I got a precious handbag stolen while in a bar in  Paris, with mobile phone and documents in it, can you help me with the costs I'll have to bear?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context does not contain any provisions explicitly covering theft of personal belongings (e.g., handbags, phones, documents) during travel. Coverage appears limited to flight delay compensation ('Indennizzo per Ritardo Volo') and contractor obligations regarding premium payments and documentation.

questions.question: I had dinner at our the resort yesterday, and I had an awful night with pain in the stomach and diharreha, I want to see a doctor, can you send one to our hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers flight delay indemnity (Art. 6) and does not include provisions for medical emergencies, illness, or healthcare services.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Amsterdam, shall we advance the payment of the hospital?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy exclusively covers flight delay compensation (SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE CHAPTER 1 – FLIGHT DELAY). There is no provision for medical expenses related to bike accidents or health-related claims.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo, is the insurance going to anticipate the costs?
questions.outcome_justification: No claim question or policy context provided for analysis

questions.question: I am traveling alone, my business partner had a hearth attack and I have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: Claim question and policy context must be provided to determine eligibility

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, my business partner had a hearth attack and we have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers flight delays exceeding 4 hours at final destination (SECTION C – CHAPTER 1 – ARTICLE 1.1). The heart attack of a business partner triggering trip interruption is not an indemnifiable event under the flight delay guarantee.

questions.question: My business partner had a hearth attack and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse the cost of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: No policy context or claim question provided to assess coverage applicability.

questions.question: I had to be in Mayorca for 15 days, but after 5 days my mother in law had a health issue and I have to go back home, will you reimburse the rest of my holidays?
questions.outcome_justification: The guarantee is valid only for flight delays exceeding 4 hours at the final destination (ARTICLE 1.1). The claim question describes an early return due to a family health issue, which is not covered under the flight delay guarantee. Exclusions in ARTICLE 1.4 do not apply here, but the event itself falls outside the scope of the policy's coverage.

questions.question: My mother in law had a health issue and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers flight delays exceeding 4 hours at final destination (ART. 1.1) and explicitly excludes flight cancellations regardless of reason (ART. 1.4). The claim involves trip cancellation due to family health issues, which is not an indemnifiable event under the flight delay guarantee.

questions.question: (Cruise) My son twisted and akle at the swimmingpool, and won't be able to walk out of the cabin for 2 days, have we got the right to a reimbursemet?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers flight delays exceeding 4 hours at final destination (SECTION C – CHAPTER 1 – ARTICLE 1.1). The injury occurred on a cruise, which is unrelated to the flight delay guarantee.

questions.question: My aunt died yesterday, we shall leave on holidays tomorrow, but obviously we need to attend the funeral and deal with family issues, will the insurance reimburse us?
Our flight was late in Dubai and we have missed the coincidence for Tokyo, the next flight will be in 10 hours. Will you reimburse us the lounge or a day hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The delay will be counted only at the final destination of the flight, any intermediate stopovers being irrelevant for the purposes of this contract.

questions.question: We had to leave for Toronto with American Airlines today, but our flight was cancelled. We will need to take the next fight depending on availability. Will you pay for an upgrade in case only more expensive tickets are available?
questions.outcome_justification: Flight cancellations and/or cancellations (regardless of the reasons from which they originate) are not considered delays and consequently the Insured is not entitled to any compensation.

questions.question: My flight landed 3 hours late in Sao Paulo, will you reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: ARTICLE 1.1 - OBJECT OF INSURANCE: 'In the event of a delay of the insured flight [...] which lasts more than 4 hours with respect to the arrival time stipulated in the flight plan [...] the Company shall indemnify the Insured'. The flight delay was 3 hours, below the 4-hour threshold.

questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The provided input lacks a specific claim question and policy context necessary to determine coverage eligibility. Without these details, no valid assessment can be made.

questions.question: (Cruise) I have an issue at work and need to stop my 2 weeks cruise in advance. Will I be reimbursed of the remaining days?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy exclusively covers FLIGHT DELAY scenarios exceeding 4 hours at the final destination (SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE CHAPTER 1 – FLIGHT DELAY). There is no provision for reimbursement of unused cruise days due to work-related interruptions.

questions.question: We are in Mexico, and we had an alarm at our place, maybe there was a robbery. Will you reimburse the damage?
questions.outcome_justification: SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE CHAPTER 1 – FLIGHT DELAY ARTICLE 1.1 specifies coverage only for flight delays exceeding 4 hours at the final destination. The policy does not cover property damage or theft at a residence.

questions.question: I am traveing in India with my wife and two kids. My wife's uncle died yesteday, and we must wrap-up and go back (he was very close to us), will the company reimburse us for the expenses of changin tickets, so that we can be present to his burial?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers flight delays exceeding 4 hours at the final destination (SECTION C – CHAPTER 1 – ARTICLE 1.1). The claim involves ticket changes due to a family bereavement, which is not listed as a covered event in the provided policy sections.

questions.question: We are traveling in India, a massive flood has blocked us here, and we are supposed to take our flight back home tomorrow. Realistically, we won't be able to move before a couple of days. Will the insurance assume the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: [...] floods [...] and other atmospheric phenomena declared to be natural disasters [...] (SECTION C – INSURANCE GUARANTEE, ARTICLE 1.4)

questions.question: (Cruise) My hausbad had a stroke during the cruise, we are now in Athens, in the hospital, but the ship has gone. Will you reimburse us and pay for the hospital and for the flights back to Rome?
questions.outcome_justification: The claim question and policy context required for analysis were not provided in the input.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are traveling in the Caraibe, but our neighbour called that there's a water leak in our appartment. We can't do much, but as we will be back in 5 days, it might be too late. Can you send someone?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context and claim question were not provided in the prompt, making it impossible to determine coverage eligibility based on specific policy terms, conditions, or exclusions.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are supposed to leave in two days, but my son broke his wrist playing basketball. We wish to move our reservation of one month, will you help us with the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy's Flight Delay Guarantee (ARTICLE 1.1) only covers delays of insured flights exceeding 4 hours at final destination. The claim involves rescheduling a cruise reservation due to a personal injury, which is unrelated to flight delays and not addressed in the policy provisions.

questions.question: I am at the airport in New York with my family and my bag was shipped to Dubai. Do I have the right to a refund from the insurance?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy's flight delay guarantee (ARTICLE 1.1) explicitly covers delays exceeding 4 hours at the final destination, not misrouted luggage. Bag shipment to Dubai does not constitute a 'delay' as defined in the policy. Additionally, the insured must be resident in Italy (SECTION A – DEFINITIONS), which is not confirmed in the claim.

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but one of our team didn't recieve the bag at the airport. Does he has the right to a reimbursement?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy only covers FLIGHT DELAY compensation (ART. 9-15 refer to flight delay guarantees). Baggage loss is not mentioned in the provided policy context as an indemnifiable event.

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but 4 of our team (two couples of coleauges) have to leave back due to urgent matters at work. Will the company reimburse their trip?

I am traveling to Japan and had a stop in Dubai with my family of 4. Our flight arrived in Dubai 4 hours later. Although we didn't miss the conicidence with our flight to Tokyo, will the insurance contribute for the discomfort?
questions.outcome_justification: The provided policy context and claim question are missing or incomplete, making it impossible to determine coverage based on the specific circumstances and policy wording.
